snippet: The N.B.A. Development League on Friday will stage its annual draft, an unglamorous exercise that is nonetheless essential for recruiting players whom teams see value in developing.
abstract: NBA Development League is staging its annual draft, an unglamorous exercise that is nonetheless essential for recruiting players that teams see the most value in developing.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. Development League on Friday will stage its annual draft, an unglamorous exercise that is nonetheless essential for recruiting players whom teams see value in developing.

headline.main: No Lights or Cameras, but Draft Has Action
headline.print_headline: No Lights or Cameras, But Draft Has Action
